title: Goat Simulator
description: Goat Simulator is the latest in goat simulation technology, bringing next-gen goat simulation to YOU. You no longer have to fantasize about being a goat, your dreams have finally come true!Gameplay-wise, Goat Simulator is all about causing as much destruction as you possibly can as a goat. It has been compared to an old-school skating game, except instead of being a skater, you're a goat, and instead of doing tricks, you wreck stuff. When it comes to goats, not even the sky is the limit, as you can probably just bug through it and crash the game.DISCLAIMERGoat Simulator is a completely stupid game and, to be honest, you should probably spend your money on something else, such as a hula hoop, a pile of bricks, or maybe pool your money together with your friends and buy a real goat.KEY FEATURES‚Ä¢ You can be a goat ‚Ä¢ Get points for wrecking stuff - brag to your friends that you're the alpha goat ‚Ä¢ MILLIONS OF BUGS! We're only eliminating the crash-bugs, everything else is hilarious and we're keeping it ‚Ä¢ In-game physics that bug out all the time ‚Ä¢ Seriously look at that goat's neck ‚Ä¢ You can be a goatAndroid TV users: a compatible gamepad is required to play
descriptionHTML:
Goat Simulator is the latest in goat simulation technology, bringing next-gen goat simulation to YOU. You no longer have to fantasize about being a goat, your dreams have finally come true!

Gameplay-wise, Goat Simulator is all about causing as much destruction as you possibly can as a goat. It has been compared to an old-school skating game, except instead of being a skater, you're a goat, and instead of doing tricks, you wreck stuff. When it comes to goats, not even the sky is the limit, as you can probably just bug through it and crash the game.

DISCLAIMER
Goat Simulator is a completely stupid game and, to be honest, you should probably spend your money on something else, such as a hula hoop, a pile of bricks, or maybe pool your money together with your friends and buy a real goat.

KEY FEATURES
• You can be a goat
• Get points for wrecking stuff - brag to your friends that you're the alpha goat
• MILLIONS OF BUGS! We're only eliminating the crash-bugs, everything else is hilarious and we're keeping it
• In-game physics that bug out all the time
• Seriously look at that goat's neck
• You can be a goat

Android TV users: a compatible gamepad is required to play
comments: This simulator is the best simulator game yet! You are actually a goat. A few things that your can do in this simulator are completing quests to unlock different goats with special powers one is the goats that you unlock is a giant goat. One funny thing that your can do in this simulator is that you can pick up people with the goats tongue NO JOKE! I would take recommend this game is you like funny simulators!

Before the game was free; I had to pay and my phone stopped turning on because of bugs. But now it's the same thing but FREE and NO BUGS!!! Thank you so much for fixing it. Now I can feel like I'm playing this game with my cousin on his Xbox. XD ( takes forever to install so write a review while waiting )

BEST GAME EVER!!!!!!! THE ONLY THING THAT IM BUMBED ABOUT IS HOW MUCH MB IT TAKES AND MY TABLET DOESN'T HAVE THAT MUCH MEGABYTES!üò¢üò¢üò¢üòßüò¶       But goat sim is fun and odd which I like!! I my opinion I think coffee stain studios are the best devs and I like your coffee stain studio easter eggs       If you like a game with a lot of secrets and easter eggs this game is for you!! Overall I think its worth 25 stars!!!üòé

this game is sooo funny honestly i love it i love watching others play it. it never gets old tysm for makeing this game it really puts a big smile on my face and makes me laugh so hard my stomac will hurt. THANK YOU!!!

It's a fun stupid waste of time. The first game I have ever bought and am glad I did. The developers comments are spot on. But hey, the purpose of games is to have fun right?  And pretty fun to be a stupid mindless goat causing stupid mindless mayhem.

My sister had this game and she let me play it and it's AMAZING. You do haft to pay and wait a LONG LONG time to download, but it's worth it. In my opinion, if someone does not like it I hate you! Sorry, but it's soo good!üòÅüòÄüòÇ
